name: Quiver Blueprint
description: Quiver carried on the back. It is recommended to be used with the bow and arrow.

name: R1 Job Pack
description: A gift pack for R1 Job rewards. It contains Zeny x1000, Potion x5, Transformation Pack x1.

name: R3 Job Pack
description: A gift pack for R2 Job rewards. It contains Zeny x1000, Potion x5, Transformation Pack x1.

name: R4 Job Pack
description: A gift pack for R2 Job rewards. It contains Zeny x1000, Potion x5, Transformation Pack x1.

name: Rabbit Bag
description: In the far east, when the new year comes, Parents make gifts for their children, Not only to pray for the blessing of the gods, but also to preserve their memories in the future.

name: Rabbit Earmuff
description: [This is only meant for you ~ May those you love feel intimate warmth even in the winter. Cold, white breath surrounds your smiling face]

name: Rabbit Hat
description: Look! That guy has a rabbit on his head~

name: Raccoon Hat
description: Hat made for people who want to become Smokie. The creator is unknown, but it's surprisingly popular, Especially among male.

name: Raccoon Hat Blueprint
description: Hat made for people who want to become Smokie. The creator is unknown, but it's surprisingly popular, Especially among male.

name: Raccoon Hat [1]
description: Hat made for people who want to become Smokie. The creator is unknown, but it's surprisingly popular, Especially among male.

name: Raccoon Leaf
description: Smokie's Transformation Leaf. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Rafini Staff [2]
description: A stick made of the stones frequently used by the Lamini clan when gathering magic.
